parkR 0.0.2
  • Reference

Function reference

usethis-style functions for R Markdown

Add or modify components of an R Markdown project

use_rmd_html()
Setup an R Markdown files which will knit to HTML with my preferred defaults
use_rmd_children()
Generate some R Markdown child documents in a specific folder
use_bibliography()
Generate a directory with a bibliography and CSL file.

Format text for Markdown, LaTeX, or HTML

Add basic Markdown, LaTeX, or HTML formatting to strings

md_bold() md_italic() md_code() md_superscript() md_subscript() md_footnote() md_math() md_eq()
Add basic Markdown formatting to strings
tex_bold() tex_italic() tex_superscript() tex_code()
Apply basic LaTeX formatting commands to strings
html_bold() html_italic() html_superscript() html_subscript() html_strikethrough()
Add basic HTML tags to strings

Format R Markdown cross-references

Construct bookdown cross-references for tables, figures, or equations

rmd_cref_tab() rmd_cref_fig() rmd_cref_eq()
Construct bookdown cross-references for tables, figures, or equations

Miscellaneous functions

sqglue()
Construct a glue expression using square brackets
download_csl()
Download a CSL file from the CSL file repositories at either Zotero or GitHub
